page_content:
Edit Instruments

Version:MissionOS_2.0

The Edit Instruments functionality is an essential data editing tool, that allows you to seamlessly move an instrument, from one location to another on the map.

In this manual, you can follow instructions as to how to move an instrument from one location to another in the project map of MissionOS application. The Home Page of the portal displays the map of the construction project. The instruments created for the project can be seen as icons at various locations on the map. Transfer of an instrument results in the change of the icon location displayed on the map.

 

 

The first step to initiate such a process is to select the Instrument Type of the instrument to be moved.

Select the instrument ID that you wish to move from the Instrument Selection list.

 

 

Next, navigate to Admin Tools menu.

Select Edit Instruments from the dropdown to open the Data editing tools panel.

 

 

Then, click the Move Instruments button.

The instrument icon in the map changes from static to adjustable mode.

You can now move the icon to another location by holding and moving the left-hand mouse cursor. Click Save.

 

Lastly, check to confirm whether the instrument ID relocation is a success.

 

To watch the Web User Manual video on Edit Instruments, simply click on the thumbnail or link below:
